sub_title: Project Manager | Program Manager | Product Manager with strong leadership skills and good understanding of technologies
summary:
I am an international Project Manager | Program Manager | Product Manager with strong leadership skills and a global mindset.

Having started my career as a developer I have adopted a good understanding of technology and an ability to quickly get familiar with a new tech stack, dive into the essence of the challenge and manage effectively even the most professionally advanced team.  

* Over 7 years of Management experience, guiding cross-functional teams both as Dev Lead and Project Manager
* Versatile practice working with both high-value business and small-scale products

* Clear and effective communication, both verbal and written, with English- and Russian-speaking clients or colleagues
* Proven ability to quickly understand and utilise new technologies and tools

* Visionary leadership with sincere care for the people
* Profound experience to build and effectively balance time-cost-scope triangle
* Solid understanding how to set up roadmap and define milestones to be able to lead the project to success

* Full ownership of responsibilities
* Decision maker with solid reliance on data
* Passion for a systematic approach to problem-solving
* Capacity for finding and implementing simple and effective solutions, building procedures and policies as needed

* Careful risk assessment and mitigation
* Critical consideration and analysis of tasks, finding “logical holes”, raising significant questions, paying attention to details 

* Flexibility in constantly changing environment
* Strong stakeholder management skills
* Continuous attention to manage and satisfy client expectations 
* Ready to limit new feature requests when it endangers project completion and provide respectful reasoning for the client

* Accustomed to work in cross-cultural environment and help people find the best way to collaborate
* Successful in training and coaching colleagues to become full-functioning managers

* Ability to prioritise work and multi-task efficiently
* Hard-working, determined, and self-motivated individual with a strong drive to deliver quality results on time
* Continuous self-development as a manager with classroom and online trainings, articles and books

Top 5 strongest themes according to Clifton Strengths Assignment:

* Responsibility - Full ownership, always 
* Relator - Building strong personal connections 
* Intellection - Naturally attracted to solving complicated problems 
* Deliberative - Predict, identify and lower risks 
* Restorative - Get energy from fixing what's broken

contributors.headline: Project Manager | Program Manager | Product Manager with strong leadership skills and good understanding of technologies

profile_positions.description:
- Led teams of various sizes - 4, 8, 16, 20 people, built from a set of roles - Product Owners, Designers, Mobile Apps developers, Frontend developers, Backend-side developers.
- Quarterly evaluated performance of team members.
- Continuously given motivational and developmental feedback to empower growth of team members.
- Interviewed and onboarded new team members.
- Helped teams set vision, quarterly goals, ideate on them and achieve success. 
- Organised the merge of two independent teams working on different platforms (iOS and Android) into one, arranging agreements, expectations, processes. 
- Conducted the split of 20+ members team into 2 teams with different scope and balanced resources and expertise.
- Driven and promoted cross-team and cross-platform collaboration and knowledge sharing.
- Mentored peers of various job titles to adopt a Team Lead role and successfully manage a separate team.
- Organised 2 department-level (40 and 100+ participants) events to build community together, share learnings and just have a great time.
- Managed Replatforming Program

Projects:
- Guest-facing native mobile apps on iOS and Android, covering different segments of user journey
- Desktop & mobile property management product for small businesses 
- Partner-facing mobile & backend products
profile_positions.title: Team Lead, Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Developed features for native Booking.com iOS application in collaboration with designer, copywriter, backend developer, other client-side developers. 
- Conducted technical phone interviews for iOS Developer role.
profile_positions.title: iOS Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Defined tasks for all members of the team: Developer, QA, Dev Lead, DevOps. Had a personal responsibility for team results.
- Elaborated project demands with the customer.
- Have led daily/weekly scrums with the clients, daily stand-ups with the teams. Planned budget/resource for the projects.
- Set up and sustained a Lean and Kanban environment.
- Re-prioritized tasks “on the fly” according to client’s requests.
- Continuously unblocked the teams by arranging solutions for various problems.

Projects:
- Bloomfire Corporate Social Network Mobile Apps. 
- Politifact.com redesign. 
- PipelineDeals-Leankit automatic synchronisation.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Developed games in XCode and Unity3D environments.
- Had a personal responsibility for the project from prototype to the final release. Maintained direct interaction with a customer.
- Managed graphics designer, sound designer, level designer work.
- Designed 10 game levels with growing complexity for physics Unity3D game.
- Worked over Project architecture.
- Created fun and engaging application interfaces.
- Found and implemented the most fitting music and sound effects.
- Integrated GameServer, Social Services (posting to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram), Ads. Synchronised user progress on multiple devices.
- Created and shipped Superhero Slam.
profile_positions.title: iOS, unity game developer

profile_positions.description:
- Reworked existing code, implemented new functionality according to specifications.
- Revealed and eliminated problems and errors in customized Axapta instances. Implemented integration between Axapta and other systems (MS Excel, etc.) Optimised, debugged, tested personal and alien code.
- Investigated and fixed problems operatively (developer on duty for customer support)
- Created technical specification for system modifications
- Migrated modifications from outdated system version to newer one.
- Worked in a development teams up to 5 people.
profile_positions.title: Axapta developer
